# Machines & More - E-Commerce Platform

This is a Next.js e-commerce application for industrial machines and vehicles in Ghana.

## Tech Stack
- Framework: Next.js (App Router)
- Language: TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- UI Components: ShadCN/UI
- Backend: Firebase (Firestore, Storage, Authentication)
- AI: Genkit for response suggestions

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js app router pages
- `/components` - React components
- `/lib` - Utilities and Firebase configuration
- `/types` - TypeScript type definitions

## Key Features
- Public product catalog with filtering
- Product details with image gallery
- Request to Buy lead generation system
- AI-powered sales response suggestions
- Admin dashboard for product management
- Multi-image upload with drag-and-drop reordering
